pageTitle: Move Set - Demon's Souls English Wiki
textBeforeTable: Axes and Hammers share the same move set, their biggest difference is damage type (normal vs blunt or piercing). Axe and Hammer Axe available moves by Weapon type Swords - Piercing Extra Large Sword Large Sword Straight Sword Dagger Swords - Straight Katana Curved Sword Swords - Asian Pole Spear Spears / Poles Shield - Bash Shield - Parry Shields Fist Large Axe and Large Hammer Axe and Hammer Axe Table of Contents Unfold Fold //--> google_ad_height = 90; google_ad_width = 728; google_ad_slot = "2433845190"; /* Demon's Souls Wiki - Above Content */ google_ad_client = "ca-pub-9739276392974443";
textAfterTable: 2 Handed R1 — R1 alternating vertical Swipe Stunlock. Great for breaking guards. R2 — R2 heavy horizontal Chop Roll — R1 Uppercut Backstep or Run — R1 heavy running overhead vertical Chop Forward + R1 heavy Push L1 or L2 Guard Large Axe and Large Hammer 1 Handed R1 — R1 horizontal Swipe R2 — R2 heavy vertical Chop Roll — R1 horizontal ground Swipe Backstep or Run — R1 vertical Chop Forward + R1 Push L1 (left hand) Guard L2 (left hand) vertical Chop 2 Handed R1 — R1 alternating vertical Swipe More powerful than the 1-handed Attack. Great for breaking guards.
